history.title: Our History
history.content: Since our inception, DikaFood has been committed to providing superior quality food products while maintaining lasting relationships with our local producers. Our journey began with a simple vision: to make healthy and sustainable food accessible to all.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to create a bridge between local producers and consumers, ensuring the quality and traceability of each product. We strive to promote responsible eating while supporting the local economy.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: Sustainability is at the heart of our operations. We are committed to minimizing our environmental impact, supporting sustainable farming practices, and promoting responsible consumption. Every product in our catalog is carefully selected to meet our high standards of quality and ethics.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Our passionate team works tirelessly to provide you with the best possible service. From product selection to delivery, each member of our team shares our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.

dika-premium.name: Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil
dika-premium.description: Our premium olive oil, cold-pressed and carefully selected for its exceptional quality.

ouedfes-classic.name: Classic Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ouedfes-classic.description: A traditional olive oil, rich in flavors and nutritional benefits.

shop.title: Our Shop
shop.subtitle: Discover our selection of authentic Moroccan products

footer.description: Dikafood is a Moroccan company specialized in the production and distribution of high-quality edible oils, with a strong commitment to excellence and tradition.

contact.title: Contact
contact.address: 18 Zenata Street, Industrial District Dokkarat, Fes
